content: 1 13 you should end up with something like this 2 pieces with just the back part extended 14 assembly almost there now we are going to join both hexagons together forming the main body of your cardigan so exciting take both hexagons and turn them inside out once more we will be stitching up the back to do this you line up both row 4 s from left and right hexagons with rs touching and ws is facing you you are going to whip stitch each double_crochet from both pieces together in blo until you reach the end 15 sleeves with rs facing out now we will be working in rounds for the sleeves you can attach your yarn in any space between the double_crochet on the sleeve/arm hole i chose to attach under the arm round 1 with accent color attach yarn ch1 single_crochet in same ch2 *skip 3 double_crochet single_crochet in space between double_crochet ch2* around once you reach the seam at the top of the shoulder decrease in both corner spaces continue to repeat from * to * until the end of the round slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut and tie off decrease 16 round 2 with main color attach yarn in ch2 space ch3 2 double_crochet in same space *3 double_crochet in next ch2 space* around until end slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut and tie off round 3 with accent color attach yarn in space between double_crochet ch1 single_crochet in same space ch2 *skip 3 double_crochet single_crochet in space between double_crochet ch2* around until the end of round slip stitch to first single_crochet cut and tie off round 4-9 repeat round 2-3 three more times round 10 with main color attach yarn in a ch2 space ch3 2 double_crochet in same *3dctog cluster over next 2 ch2 spaces ch1 3 double_crochet in next ch2 space* repeat until you reach the end slip_stitch to top of chain cut and tie off 3dctog cluster it s okay if the stitches don t add up and you have an extra ch2 space just add another 3 double_crochet and finish your round stitch counts will vary depending on yarn choice and if you previously added/subtracted any rounds or row 17 round 11 with accent color attach yarn ch1 single_crochet in same ch2 *skip 3 double_crochet single_crochet in space between 3 double_crochet and 3dctog cluster ch2 single_crochet in ch1 space after cluster ch2* repeat until the end slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut and tie off round 12 with main color attach yarn ch3 2 double_crochet in same 3 double_crochet in next ch2 space 3dctog cluster in next 2 spaces *3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet in next 3dctog cluster ch1* repeat until the end of the round slip_stitch to top of ch3 cut and tie off -repeat rounds 1-12 on other sleeve cuffs make 2 row1 ch13 single_crochet in in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across ch1 turn row2 single_crochet in blo across ch1 turn row3-26 repeat row2 until cuff
